description:
Breast cancer is one of the leading cancer-related death causes
worldwide, specially for women. In this talk, we will talk about how
Deep Learning & Python could help pathologists to classify breast cancer
microscopic images. The speaker will share his approach that won the
“\ `ICIAR 2018 Grand Challenge on Breast Cancer Histology
images <https://iciar2018-challenge.grand-challenge.org/Legacy-results/>`__\ ”,
which was implemented in Python.

Refer to the papers for more details:

-  https://arxiv.org/abs/1808.04277
-  https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-319-93000-8_106
title: Breast cancer classification in digital pathology using Python and Deep Learning
